item.title: NPM Supply Chain Attack
item.description: This page has lack of content yet. Dependency Confusion linkThe PoC is available thanks to the researcher who discovered the threat. Lock File Injection linkAttackers may insert their malicious npm package into yarn.lock or package-lock.json in the target project.
